languages.text: "Не воспримите как оскорбление, Ваша Светлость! Лорд-капитан никогда бы не упустил шанс насладиться личной беседой с себе... подобн{mf|ым|ой}. {n}Мастер вокса звучно откашливается, подбирая слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не воспримите как оскорбление, Ваша Светлость! Лорд-капитан никогда бы не упустил шанс насладиться личной беседой с себе... подобн{mf|ым|ой}. {n}Мастер Вокса звучно откашливается, подбирая слова.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mon intention n'était pas de vous offenser, Votre Seigneurie ! En temps normal, rien ne ferait plus plaisir au seigneur-capitaine que d'entretenir une conversation privée avec... {mf|un homme|une femme} de son rang... {n}Le maître-vox s'éclaircit bruyamment la gorge tandis qu'il cherche ses mots.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Mon intention n'était pas de vous offenser, Votre Seigneurie ! En temps normal, rien ne ferait plus plaisir au seigneur-capitaine que d'entretenir une conversation privée avec... {mf|un homme|une femme} de son rang... {n}Le maître-vox s'éclaircit bruyamment la gorge tandis qu'il cherche ses mots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我无意冒犯，大人！如果舰长大人在的话，他绝不会错过与……和他地位相仿的领主舰长私下交流的机会。”{n}音阵大师大声清了清嗓子，寻找着合适的词语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我无意冒犯，大人！如果舰长大人在的话，他绝不会错过与……和他地位相仿的领主舰长私下交流的机会。”{n}音阵大师大声清了清嗓子，寻找着合适的词语。{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch nicht beleidigen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Der Lord Captain würde sich niemals die Gelegenheit entgehen lassen, eine Unterhaltung mit ... {mf|einem Mann|einer Frau} von ähnlichem Status zu genießen. {n}Der Voxmeister räuspert sich laut, während er nach den richtigen Worten sucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euch nicht beleidigen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Der Lord Captain würde sich niemals die Gelegenheit entgehen lassen, eine Unterhaltung mit ... {mf|einem Mann|einer Frau} von ähnlichem Status zu genießen. {n}Der Voxmeister räuspert sich laut, während er nach den richtigen Worten sucht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «¡No quisiera ofenderl{mf|o|a}, {mf|milord|milady}! El Lord Capitán jamás desaprovecharía la oportunidad de disfrutar de una conversación privada con... {mf|un hombre|una mujer} en una situación similar a la suya». {n}El maestro de voco carraspea ruidosamente buscando las palabras correctas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No quisiera ofenderl{mf|o|a}, {mf|milord|milady}! El Lord Capitán jamás desaprovecharía la oportunidad de disfrutar de una conversación privada con... {mf|un hombre|una mujer} en una situación similar a la suya». {n}El maestro de voco carraspea ruidosamente buscando las palabras correctas.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「気を悪くしないでほしい、陛下！ロード・キャプテンというのは、同じ地位にある{mf|男性|女性}と個人的に会話できる機会を見逃したくないものだ」{n}ヴォクス・マスターは大きく咳払いし、言葉を探した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「気を悪くしないでほしい、陛下！ロード・キャプテンというのは、同じ地位にある{mf|男性|女性}と個人的に会話できる機会を見逃したくないものだ」{n}ヴォクス・マスターは大きく咳払いし、言葉を探した。{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi rencide etmek istemem! Lord Kaptan sizin gibi... Eş mertebede bir {mf|beyefendiyle|hanımefendiyle} muhabbet etme fırsatını asla kaçırmazdı. {n}Voks Üstadı, yüksek sesle boğazını temizleyip doğru sözcükleri arıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The Lord Captain would never miss an opportunity to enjoy a personal conversation with... a {mf|man|woman} of similar station. {n}The Vox Master loudly clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}
